com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.extension.util.registration
Class DeviceInfo

java.lang.Object
  com.sonyericsson.extras.liveware.extension.util.registration.DeviceInfo

public class DeviceInfo
extends java.lang.Object

The device info class describes a host application device. This class only contains a subset of the information available for the device.

Constructor Summary

          Create device info.

context - The context.

id - The device id.
widgetWidth - The widget width.
widgetHeight - The widget height.
vibrator - True if device has a vibrator.
